text: There is potential during this period to leave a lasting mark on this world. You have the opportunity to leave something behind that people will remember. You have the opportunity to educate, inspire and make an impression so do not let it pass you by. You will have the ability to effectively resolve conflict and your sense of vision will inspire others to their own ideals. Don't simply charge ahead without a plan. This is a time where your every move needs to be calculated and considered because how you forge ahead will determine how you are remembered. It is, after all, possible to teach the world negative lessons, too, so make sure the mark you make is a positive and lasting one.
